name: Radical Adventure (working title)
description:
(8/25/2018) A new build is available! This update includes:

  • Hub world mode
  • Split screen multiplayer
  • Multiple playable characters each with different abilities
  • A new tutorial level
  • Improved movement controls
  • Save slots
  • Level select screen
  • Level results screen which shows your best ranking

Please note that the web version of this game is not optimized yet and this game runs best in one of the builds below. Also the web version of the game does not support save data across multiple play sessions.

This is only a prototype and I'm looking for feedback so I can improve this game going forward. Please consider filling out a feedback survey linked here.

This game is best experienced with a gamepad. In addition to keyboards, it supports PS4, Xbox One, and Xbox 360 controllers.

Radical Adventure (working title) is an action platformer in which you play as a character who has super speed. Run on walls, run through loops, and boost through enemies as you make your way to the finish line.

The controls are as follows (Keyboard / PS4 / Xbox 360):

  • Run - WASD / Left joystick / Left joystick
  • Jump - Space / X / A
  • Boost - Left Shift / Square / X
  • Rotate camera (in certain segments) - Left & right arrow keys / L2 & R2 / LT & RT
  • Bring up menu - Esc / Options / Start

Music was gotten via the Unity Asset Store and is by NA-GO-GE-B.
